concept.title: Quiz: DITA Maps
concept.shortdesc: This quiz assesses understanding of the concepts introduced in Part II: DITA Maps.

conbody.p: 1. What is the main purpose of a DITA map?

ul.li: a) Store the full text of topics
b) Control the formatting of XML files

li.b: c) Organize and reference topics for publishing

conbody.p: 2. How do DITA maps support content reuse?

ul.li: a) By allowing content to be duplicated

li.b: b) By allowing topics to be rearranged and reused in multiple outputs

ul.li: c) By removing the need for structured authoring
d) By copying all content into one file

conbody.p: 3. Which DITA map feature automatically generates cross-references between related topics that don't follow the hierarchical structure?
4. What is the main advantage of using navtitle attributes in DITA maps?

ul.li: a) They improve search engine optimization

li.b: b) They allow different titles for navigation versus content without changing the actual topics

ul.li: c) They automatically translate titles into multiple languages
d) They make topics load faster in published output

conbody.p: 5. Which DITA feature allows for the easiest reorganization of content?
